Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ConnectionId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="MachineAuthenticationMethod" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="RemoteMachineAccount" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserAuthenticationMethod" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="RemoteUserAcount" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RemoteIPAddress" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="LocalIPAddress" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TechnologyProviderKey" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="IPsecTrafficMode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DHGroup" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StartTime" inType="win:SYSTEMTIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ConnectionId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="MachineAuthenticationMethod" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="RemoteMachineAccount" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="UserAuthenticationMethod" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="RemoteUserAcount" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="RemoteIPAddress" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="LocalIPAddress" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TechnologyProviderKey" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="IPsecTrafficMode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BytesTransferredInbound" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="BytesTransferredOutbound" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="BytesTransferredTotal" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="StartTime" inType="win:SYSTEMTIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> <data name="CloseTime" inType="win:SYSTEMTIME" outType="xs:dateTime"/> </template>
